name: Ten alders
description:
The game took me around 3h45min to make.

You play a poor snowman lost alone in a blizzard.

You can push against different objects using the arrow keys, if you fall in the water you'll respawn to the nearest checkpoint.

You can press R to respawn at the last checkpoint or at the start of the game

The game can be quite janky sometime, I think I've fixed most ways of softlocking yourself, but I might not have found everything.

The name doesn't have a lot to do with the actual game, but had to find one sooooo....

I'm not very proud of this game, but I'm glad I finally published a game, after participating to way too many game jams and I hope I can do better next time.

I've used a tileset made by stealthix that you can find here https://stealthix.itch.io/rpg-nature-tileset

Updated the game to add a respawn button, and a quick fix to actually make it workl.
